root.name: OMG-Z
root.description: OverviewOMG-Z is a puzzle game in the form of a top down shooter, where the player has to clear an area of zombies using his rifle to make them explode. Because of strictly limited ammo, the player is forced to pick his targets carefully, trying to create a chain reaction that takes out a whole cluster of zombies at once.The game features 81 waves of zombies over 32 different environments, an extensive upgrade system, and multiple paths through the game leading to several different endings.
